author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: this zero-dependency package will provide a persistent, in-browser database
name: db-lite

scripts.publish-alias: VERSION=$(npm info $npm_package_name version); for ALIAS in browserdb cachedb microdb nanodb netdb swaggerdb swggdb udb; do utility2 shRun shNpmPublish $ALIAS $VERSION; utility2 shRun shNpmTestPublished $ALIAS || exit $?; done
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover test.js
scripts.test: export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test test.js
